comment.body: Maybe check democracy now. I haven't been watching lately but they covered this story.
What kind of discussions are you hoping for?
Do you actually want to discuss furies or are you just looking for some fetish pics?
@Pigpog:  Maybe create a fetish board like zerotalk, or one of the cat boards.
If you go to Zero Sites there is a meetup board. It's just general (i.e. not specifically for furries),  but maybe you can find more of the type of conversation that you are looking for there.
So your solution to bullying is to become the bully?

If it started then you should just be able to type http://127.0.0.1:43110/

Into one of the Android browsers.

Pooh, isn't a panda though and Panda's aren't yellow.  The only people that will do this are trolls as a form of black propaganda.

Such silliness reminds me of:

"Goofy Right-Wing troll tries to get AOC support for eating Babies" -- secular talk
https://youtu.be/aMKKqQZMRqk
